info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:58PM CDT until August 07 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ITAWAMBA AND NORTHERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 158 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Weston to near New Salem to near Amory, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Smithville, Tremont, New Salem, Hatley, Gattman, Sipsey Fork, Becker, Quincy, Turon, Splunge, Wise Gap, Athens, Greenwood Springs, Parham and Cadamy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
